So... was she real? Rance takes the lead."},{"lineNumber":260086,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景　リーザス城内とか","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: inside Leazas Castle, or similar."},{"lineNumber":260087,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらです。","translatedEnglishLine":"This way."},{"lineNumber":260088,"originalJapaneseLine":"とシィルかビスケッタさんの案内で別室に行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Sil or Bisketta guided them to another room."},{"lineNumber":260089,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには子供達が居た","translatedEnglishLine":"There were children there."},{"lineNumber":260090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260091,"originalJapaneseLine":"今回、この子達が自らの危険を顧みずランスを目覚めさせてくれたと説明","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, it was explained that these children awakened Rance despite the danger to themselves."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か「駄目だよ、もうランスは悪そのものなんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone: "No, you can't, Rance is pure evil itself now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス「・・・あれーそうだった、わしは使われ放題・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos: "...Oh yeah, that's right, I've been used all I want..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持ちさらに強くなった魔王ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Rance, having the magic sword Chaos, has become even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※別にカオスのシーンは無しでもいいです、ネタとして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Note: The Chaos scene isn't strictly necessary, it's just a gag.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにエール達の陣形は崩れ、魔王ランスの攻撃から逃げ回るだけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell's formation has already collapsed, and they can only run away from Demon Lord Rance's attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう駄目だ、撤退しかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's no use anymore, retreat is the only option.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香がみんなを逃がす為に囮になろうとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka tries to act as a decoy to let everyone escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、こっちよ。と服を脱ぎ捨てて立つが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, over here," she says, standing after stripping off her clothes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 爆風で殴り飛ばされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but she is blasted away by the explosion's shockwave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばい、ランスはだいぶ魔王の血に飲み込まれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, Rance has been significantly consumed by the demon king's blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、もう・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably, already...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはランスの攻撃をなんとかかわし続ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell somehow keeps dodging Rance's attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつか選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several options appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞石像の影に隠れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hide in the shadow of the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それはミスだった、逃げ場を失った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that was a mistake; the escape route was lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスは石像ごとエールを叩ききろうとカオスを振り下ろした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Rance swung Chaos down, attempting to strike Yell along with the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは覚悟したが・・いつまでたっても衝撃は襲ってこなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell braced himself... but the impact never came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの剣は、石像の一部を破壊した所で止まっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's sword had stopped after partially destroying the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「・・・・シィル、何故・・・お前は死んだはずでは・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sil, why... you were supposed to be dead..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り下ろした剣を止めたまま硬直しているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stood frozen, holding his sword mid-swing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにリセットが飛びかかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Reset rushed forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パーンとビンタする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She slapped him sharply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「・・・あっ・・リセットか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah... Reset, huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、また娘にビンタされたのか・・俺は・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, I got slapped by my daughter again... me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、それより・・これは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, more importantly... this is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、それは貴方のシィルさんです、本物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, that is your Sil-san, the real one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、どういう事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku, what does this mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王リトルプリンセスにより氷柱にされたシィルさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil-san was turned into an icicle by Demon Lord Little Princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな方法でもそれを解く事は出来ませんでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No method could undo that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、魔王になったランスになら、今なら出来ます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now that Rance has become demon lord, it can be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、その通りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, exactly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは氷柱シィルを解除した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance released Sil from the icy prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：魔王ランスとシィル）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Demon Lord Rance and Sil)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王城、玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Castle, throne room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははと元の状態になったランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance laughed heartily, having returned to his original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側にはシィルが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil was beside him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんがお茶を入れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisketta was preparing tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、そういう訳かとランスがクルックーから聞いた事を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, so that's how it is, Rance recounted what he heard from Kurukku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バードに殺されたシィルはＩＰボディ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil, who was killed by Bard, was an IP body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偽者だった訳だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, it was a fake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ魂は本物です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, her soul was the real one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからん、じゃ・・本物だったのか、ではここにいるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't quite get it. So... was she real? Then, the one here is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、ここに居るのは魂も身体も本物です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the one here has both the real soul and body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからんがシィルならそれでいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand, but if it's Sil, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを柱の陰からじっと見ているサテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella watched intently from the shadow of a pillar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぬぬ、私だけの魔王様が・・・はぁ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grr, my Demon Lord... sigh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは怒ってシィルを狙うというより、はぁ・・やっぱりながっかりという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than angrily targeting Sil, she just seemed... disappointed after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※この１３章からは、ランス視点です。ランスが主役
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *From Chapter 13 onward, the viewpoint is Rance's. Rance takes the lead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　リーザス城内とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: inside Leazas Castle, or similar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とシィルかビスケッタさんの案内で別室に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil or Bisketta guided them to another room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには子供達が居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were children there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回、この子達が自らの危険を顧みずランスを目覚めさせてくれたと説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, it was explained that these children awakened Rance despite the danger to themselves.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Then, the one here is..."},{"lineNumber":260078,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ、ここに居るのは魂も身体も本物です","translatedEnglishLine":"No, the one here has both the real soul and body."},{"lineNumber":260079,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よくわからんがシィルならそれでいい。","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really understand, but if it's Sil, that's fine."},{"lineNumber":260080,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260081,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを柱の陰からじっと見ているサテラ","translatedEnglishLine":"Satella watched intently from the shadow of a pillar."},{"lineNumber":260082,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐぬぬ、私だけの魔王様が・・・はぁ・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Grr, my Demon Lord... sigh..."},{"lineNumber":260083,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは怒ってシィルを狙うというより、はぁ・・やっぱりながっかりという感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather than angrily targeting Sil, she just seemed... disappointed after all."},{"lineNumber":260084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260085,"originalJapaneseLine":"※この１３章からは、ランス視点です。ランスが主役","translatedEnglishLine":"*From Chapter 13 onward, the viewpoint is Rance's. Rance takes the lead."},{"lineNumber":260086,"originalJapaneseLine":"背景　リーザス城内とか","translatedEnglishLine":"Background: inside Leazas Castle, or similar."},{"lineNumber":260087,"originalJapaneseLine":"こちらです。","translatedEnglishLine":"This way."},{"lineNumber":260088,"originalJapaneseLine":"とシィルかビスケッタさんの案内で別室に行く","translatedEnglishLine":"Sil or Bisketta guided them to another room."},{"lineNumber":260089,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこには子供達が居た","translatedEnglishLine":"There were children there."},{"lineNumber":260090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260091,"originalJapaneseLine":"今回、この子達が自らの危険を顧みずランスを目覚めさせてくれたと説明","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, it was explained that these children awakened Rance despite the danger to themselves."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か「駄目だよ、もうランスは悪そのものなんだから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Someone: "No, you can't, Rance is pure evil itself now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス「・・・あれーそうだった、わしは使われ放題・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos: "...Oh yeah, that's right, I've been used all I want..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔剣カオスを持ちさらに強くなった魔王ランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Rance, having the magic sword Chaos, has become even stronger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※別にカオスのシーンは無しでもいいです、ネタとして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Note: The Chaos scene isn't strictly necessary, it's just a gag.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すでにエール達の陣形は崩れ、魔王ランスの攻撃から逃げ回るだけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell's formation has already collapsed, and they can only run away from Demon Lord Rance's attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう駄目だ、撤退しかない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's no use anymore, retreat is the only option.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 志津香がみんなを逃がす為に囮になろうとする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shizuka tries to act as a decoy to let everyone escape.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、こっちよ。と服を脱ぎ捨てて立つが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, over here," she says, standing after stripping off her clothes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 爆風で殴り飛ばされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but she is blasted away by the explosion's shockwave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばい、ランスはだいぶ魔王の血に飲み込まれている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, Rance has been significantly consumed by the demon king's blood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たぶん、もう・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Probably, already...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールはランスの攻撃をなんとかかわし続ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell somehow keeps dodging Rance's attacks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いくつか選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several options appear.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞石像の影に隠れる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Hide in the shadow of the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、それはミスだった、逃げ場を失った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that was a mistake; the escape route was lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王ランスは石像ごとエールを叩ききろうとカオスを振り下ろした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Rance swung Chaos down, attempting to strike Yell along with the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エールは覚悟したが・・いつまでたっても衝撃は襲ってこなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yell braced himself... but the impact never came.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの剣は、石像の一部を破壊した所で止まっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance's sword had stopped after partially destroying the statue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「・・・・シィル、何故・・・お前は死んだはずでは・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Sil, why... you were supposed to be dead..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振り下ろした剣を止めたまま硬直しているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance stood frozen, holding his sword mid-swing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこにリセットが飛びかかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Reset rushed forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: パーンとビンタする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She slapped him sharply.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「・・・あっ・・リセットか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Ah... Reset, huh...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだ、また娘にビンタされたのか・・俺は・・」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What, I got slapped by my daughter again... me..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、それより・・これは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, more importantly... this is..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが現れる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、それは貴方のシィルさんです、本物です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, that is your Sil-san, the real one."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックー、どういう事だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kurukku, what does this mean?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王リトルプリンセスにより氷柱にされたシィルさん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil-san was turned into an icicle by Demon Lord Little Princess.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな方法でもそれを解く事は出来ませんでした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No method could undo that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: が、魔王になったランスになら、今なら出来ます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But now that Rance has become demon lord, it can be done.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだ、その通りだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right, exactly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは氷柱シィルを解除した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance released Sil from the icy prison.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ＣＧ：魔王ランスとシィル）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (CG: Demon Lord Rance and Sil)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王城、玉座
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Lord Castle, throne room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: がははははと元の状態になったランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance laughed heartily, having returned to his original form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 側にはシィルが居る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil was beside him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさんがお茶を入れている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Bisketta was preparing tea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるほど、そういう訳かとランスがクルックーから聞いた事を語る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, so that's how it is, Rance recounted what he heard from Kurukku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バードに殺されたシィルはＩＰボディ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil, who was killed by Bard, was an IP body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 偽者だった訳だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, it was a fake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ魂は本物です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, her soul was the real one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからん、じゃ・・本物だったのか、ではここにいるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't quite get it. So... was she real? Then, the one here is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、ここに居るのは魂も身体も本物です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the one here has both the real soul and body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくわからんがシィルならそれでいい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really understand, but if it's Sil, that's fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それを柱の陰からじっと見ているサテラ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satella watched intently from the shadow of a pillar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐぬぬ、私だけの魔王様が・・・はぁ・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Grr, my Demon Lord... sigh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは怒ってシィルを狙うというより、はぁ・・やっぱりながっかりという感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather than angrily targeting Sil, she just seemed... disappointed after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※この１３章からは、ランス視点です。ランスが主役
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *From Chapter 13 onward, the viewpoint is Rance's. Rance takes the lead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背景　リーザス城内とか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Background: inside Leazas Castle, or similar.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こちらです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とシィルかビスケッタさんの案内で別室に行く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sil or Bisketta guided them to another room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこには子供達が居た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There were children there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回、この子達が自らの危険を顧みずランスを目覚めさせてくれたと説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, it was explained that these children awakened Rance despite the danger to themselves.
